mapper.select: select tag.tag_id,tag.tag,tag.created_time,tag.last_modified_by,tag.last_modified_time from tag tag, practice_tag pt where pt.tag_id = tag.tag_id and pt.is_delete = 'N' and pt.practice_id = #{practiceId}
select tag.tag_id,tag.tag,tag.created_time,tag.last_modified_by,tag.last_modified_time from tag tag, exam_tag et where et.tag_id = tag.tag_id and et.is_delete = 'N' and et.exam_id = #{examId}
mapper.update: update practice_tag set is_delete = 'Y', last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy}, last_modified_time = unix_timestamp() * 1000 where practice_id = #{practiceId} and tag_id = tagId
update exam_tag set is_delete = 'Y', last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy}, last_modified_time = unix_timestamp() * 1000 where exam_id = #{examId} and tag_id = tagId
